description:
### neighbouringElements

This problem requires you to determine the number of neighbouring elements in a 2D array that share the same value. It will iteratively compare each element with its down and right adjacent element, incrementing a counter whenever a match is found.

Input: a 2D array
Output: A single integer that represents the total number of neighbouring pairs that share the same value.

Example:

```js neighbouringElements([[1,1,1], [1,1,1], [1,1,1]]) // 12 ```
